name: Unsplash Photos
description: Beautiful photos from Unsplash collections. Configure your own API key and choose custom collections. Requires free Unsplash API key from https://unsplash.com/developers
author: MUE Team

settings_schema.label: Unsplash Access Key
settings_schema.help_text: Get your free API key at https://unsplash.com/developers

settings_schema.label: Collection IDs
settings_schema.help_text: Optional: Comma-separated collection IDs to fetch photos from
